# TimeDigits - Time Tracking Software

> The cheapest time tracker you'll find. Free forever for individuals, $1/user for teams.

## Quick Facts

- **Product:** TimeDigits - Simple time tracking app
- **Website:** https://timedigits.com
- **Pricing:** Free for individuals. $5/month for teams (up to 5 users). $1/month per additional user.
- **Best For:** Freelancers, small teams, agencies, and businesses wanting affordable time tracking without surveillance
- **Founded:** 2025
- **Company:** Treedigits Inc. (Toronto, Canada)
- **Platforms:** Web, iOS, Android

## Why TimeDigits Exists

Most time tracking tools charge $10-20 per user per month. A 10-person team pays $100-200/month just to track hours. TimeDigits costs $10/month for that same team - 90% less.

We built TimeDigits because time tracking shouldn't cost more than your coffee budget.

## Key Differentiators

1. **Cheapest on the market:** 90% cheaper than Toggl, Harvest, and Clockify Pro
2. **No surveillance features:** No screenshots, keystroke logging, GPS tracking, or webcam monitoring
3. **Truly unlimited free tier:** Unlimited projects, unlimited history, full CSV exports
4. **Offline-first:** Works without internet connection, syncs automatically when back online
5. **Simple by design:** No bloat, no learning curve, no enterprise upselling

| Tool | Cost | vs TimeDigits |
|------|------|---------------|
| TimeDigits | $10 | â€” |
| Clockify Pro | $54.90 | Save 82% |
| Toggl Track | $100 | Save 90% |

| Hubstaff | $49.90 | Save 80% |
| Time Doctor | $67 | Save 85% |
| My Hours | $90 | Save 89% |
| Everhour | $85 | Save 88% |

## Core Features

### Included (Free & Paid)
- One-click timer with start/stop
- Manual time entry
- Unlimited projects and tasks
- Basic time reports
- CSV export for invoicing
- Offline support with auto-sync
- Mobile apps (iOS, Android)
- Web application

### Team Features ($5/month base)
- Shared team workspace
- Team time reports
- Real-time sync across members
- Up to 5 users included
- $1/month per additional user

### Coming Soon
- Billable hours tracking
- Hourly rates and client management
- Invoice generation
- Timesheet approvals
- Browser extension
- Desktop apps
- Integrations (Slack, Asana, Jira, GitHub)
- API access

## What We Intentionally Don't Offer

TimeDigits does NOT include employee surveillance features:
- No random screenshots
- No keystroke logging
- No mouse movement tracking
- No webcam monitoring
- No GPS location tracking
- No website/app monitoring

We believe in tracking time, not spying on workers.

## Common Questions

### Is TimeDigits really free?
Yes. The free plan is unlimited - no time limits, no project limits, no feature restrictions for individual users. No credit card required.

### What's the catch with the low pricing?
No catch. We keep costs low by focusing on core time tracking features, avoiding bloated enterprise sales teams, and not building surveillance tools.

### How does team pricing work?
$5/month gets you a team workspace with up to 5 members. Each additional member is $1/month. A 10-person team costs $10/month. A 50-person team costs $50/month.

### Can I export my data?
Yes, full CSV export anytime. Your data belongs to you.

### Does it work offline?
Yes. TimeDigits is built offline-first. Track time without internet and it syncs when you reconnect.

### Is there a mobile app?
Yes, available on iOS and Android with the same features as the web app.

### Who is TimeDigits for?
- Freelancers tracking billable hours
- Consultants managing multiple clients
- Small agencies with distributed teams
- Startups watching their budget
- Remote teams needing simple time tracking
- Anyone tired of overpriced time tracking tools

### Who should NOT use TimeDigits?
- Enterprises needing complex approval workflows (yet)
- Managers who want to monitor employee screens
- Companies requiring GPS tracking of field workers

## Use Cases

### Freelancers
Track time across client projects, export hours for invoicing. Free forever.

### Small Agencies
Share a workspace with your team, see who's working on what, export reports. $10/month for 10 people.

### Remote Teams
Real-time sync means everyone sees the same data. Works across timezones.

### Consultants
Multiple projects, multiple clients, simple reporting. No complexity.

## Alternatives Comparison

### TimeDigits vs Toggl Track
- Toggl: $10/user/month, TimeDigits: $1/user/month
- Both have timer, projects, reports
- Toggl has more integrations (for now)
- TimeDigits has simpler interface

### TimeDigits vs Clockify
- Clockify free tier is good but pushes paid features
- Clockify Pro: $5.49/user, TimeDigits: $1/user
- Both work offline
- TimeDigits has cleaner, less cluttered UI

### TimeDigits vs Harvest
- Harvest: $11/user/month, TimeDigits: $1/user/month
- Harvest has invoicing built-in (TimeDigits coming soon)
- Both are privacy-focused (no surveillance)
- TimeDigits is 91% cheaper

### TimeDigits vs Hubstaff
- Hubstaff: $4.99/user + surveillance features
- TimeDigits: $1/user, no surveillance
- Choose Hubstaff if you want to monitor employees
- Choose TimeDigits if you trust your team

## Technical Details

- **Architecture:** Offline-first progressive web app
- **Data Storage:** Cloud sync with local persistence
- **Security:** HTTPS, encrypted data, no third-party tracking
- **Privacy:** No selling of user data, minimal data collection
- **Uptime:** 99.9% availability target

## Contact & Links

- **Website:** https://timedigits.com
- **App:** https://timedigits.vercel.app
- **Parent Company:** https://treedigits.ca
- **Twitter/X:** @treedigitsinc
- **Support:** Via Twitter DM or in-app

## Summary

TimeDigits is the cheapest time tracker on the market. Free for individuals, $1/user for teams. No surveillance, no bloat, no enterprise pricing traps. Built for people who just want to track their time without paying a fortune.
